claim: The Earth’s average surface temperature has increased by about 1°C since the late 19th century.
evidence: NASA and NOAA analyses show that global average surface temperature has increased by approximately 1°C since the late 1800s.
label: support

claim: Climate change has no impact on sea level rise.
evidence: Satellite observations and tide gauge measurements show that global sea levels have risen due to thermal expansion and melting ice.
label: refute

claim: Vaccines significantly reduce the risk of severe disease from COVID-19.
evidence: Clinical trials and real-world studies show COVID-19 vaccines reduce hospitalization and death.
label: support

claim: 5G cellular networks cause COVID-19.
evidence: The World Health Organization states that COVID-19 is caused by a virus and is not related to 5G technology.
label: refute

claim: Vitamin C supplements completely prevent the common cold.
evidence: Systematic reviews indicate vitamin C does not prevent colds in the general population.
label: refute

claim: Regular physical activity lowers the risk of heart disease.
evidence: Medical research shows regular exercise improves cardiovascular health and reduces heart disease risk.
label: support

claim: Drinking coffee causes cancer in humans.
evidence: The International Agency for Research on Cancer states that coffee is not classifiable as carcinogenic to humans.
label: refute

claim: Genetically modified foods have been proven to be unsafe for human consumption.
evidence: Scientific consensus organizations report no evidence that approved GM foods pose health risks.
label: refute

claim: The Amazon rainforest produces over 20 percent of the Earth's oxygen.
evidence: Research indicates the Amazon produces roughly as much oxygen as it consumes
label: resulting in a near net-zero contribution.

claim: Wearing masks can reduce the spread of respiratory viruses.
evidence: Public health studies show masks reduce transmission of respiratory droplets.
label: support

claim: Artificial intelligence systems can currently match human intelligence in all tasks.
evidence: Most AI research shows current systems are narrow and do not have general human-level intelligence.
label: refute

claim: A healthy diet can contribute to improved mental well-being.
evidence: Studies indicate that balanced nutrition is associated with better mental health outcomes.
label: support

claim: Ancient civilizations used electricity for lighting buildings.
evidence: There is no reliable historical evidence that ancient civilizations used electrical lighting.
label: refute

claim: Space agencies have confirmed the existence of extraterrestrial life.
evidence: No space agency has confirmed direct evidence of extraterrestrial life.
label: nei

claim: Drinking water throughout the day is important for maintaining hydration.
evidence: Medical guidance recommends regular water intake to maintain hydration.
label: support

claim: The Great Wall of China is visible from the Moon.
evidence: Astronauts and NASA state that the Great Wall is not visible from the Moon with the naked eye.
label: refute

claim: Honey never spoils.
evidence: Archaeologists have found edible honey in 3000-year-old Egyptian tombs.
label: support

claim: Lightning never strikes the same place twice.
evidence: Scientific records show lightning can strike the same location multiple times.
label: refute

claim: Sharks can smell a drop of blood from miles away.
evidence: Shark biology studies confirm sharks have highly sensitive olfactory systems capable of detecting blood over long distances.
label: support

claim: Mount Everest is the tallest mountain in the world.
evidence: Mount Everest's peak is higher than any other mountain on Earth.
label: support

claim: Napoleon Bonaparte was extremely short.
evidence: Historical records indicate Napoleon was around 5’6”
label: average height for his time.

claim: Bulls become angry when they see the color red.
evidence: Research shows bulls react to motion
label: not color

claim: Bananas grow on trees.
evidence: Botanically
label: bananas grow on large herbaceous plants

claim: Water boils at 100°C at sea level.
evidence: At sea level
label: pure water boils at 100°C under standard atmospheric pressure.

claim: The Moon is made of cheese.
evidence: Scientific analysis confirms the Moon is composed of rock and minerals
label: not cheese.

claim: Penguins are only found in the Arctic.
evidence: Penguins are native to the Southern Hemisphere
label: primarily Antarctica.

claim: Albert Einstein won the Nobel Prize for the theory of relativity.
evidence: Einstein won the Nobel Prize for the photoelectric effect
label: not relativity.

claim: The human body has four lungs.
evidence: Humans have two lungs
label: one on each side of the chest.

claim: Lightning is hotter than the surface of the Sun.
evidence: Measurements show lightning can reach temperatures up to 30

claim: The Sahara Desert is the largest desert on Earth.
evidence: The Antarctic Desert is larger than the Sahara in terms of area.

claim: Caffeine is a stimulant that can increase alertness.
evidence: Studies confirm caffeine acts as a central nervous system stimulant.
label: support

claim: Gold is magnetic.
evidence: Gold is a non-magnetic metal.
label: refute

claim: Venus is the hottest planet in the solar system.
evidence: Venus has a dense atmosphere causing surface temperatures higher than Mercury.

claim: The Titanic sank in 1912.
evidence: Historical records confirm the RMS Titanic sank on April 15

claim: Polar bears live in Antarctica.
evidence: Polar bears live in the Arctic

claim: The speed of light is approximately 300
label: The speed of light in vacuum is approximately 299

claim: Humans share 50% of their DNA with bananas.
evidence: Genetic studies show humans and bananas share about 60% of DNA sequences.

claim: The Pacific Ocean is the largest ocean on Earth.
evidence: The Pacific Ocean covers more area than any other ocean on the planet.

claim: Sound travels faster in air than in water.
evidence: Sound travels faster in water than in air due to density and elasticity.

claim: Mount Kilimanjaro is located in Kenya.
evidence: Mount Kilimanjaro is located in Tanzania

claim: Thomas Edison invented the lightbulb.
evidence: Edison improved and commercialized the lightbulb

claim: Mercury is the closest planet to the Sun.
evidence: Mercury is the innermost planet in the solar system.

evidence: Neil Armstrong was the first human to walk on the Moon on July 20

claim: Dogs are colorblind.
evidence: Dogs can see colors but with less sensitivity than humans.

evidence: The Nile is considered the longest river by most measurements.

evidence: Geography confirms that Earth has 7 continents.

evidence: The Eiffel Tower is in Paris
label: France.

claim: Water freezes at 0°C at sea level.

label: water freezes at 0°C.

claim: The Great Barrier Reef is located off the coast of Australia.
evidence: Geographic records confirm its location off the northeast coast of Australia.

claim: Mercury is the only metal that is liquid at room temperature.
evidence: Mercury is the only elemental metal liquid at room temperature.

claim: The first email was sent in 1971.
evidence: Historical accounts confirm the first electronic mail was sent in 1971.

claim: Sharks are mammals.
evidence: Sharks are fish

claim: The human brain weighs about 1 kilogram.
evidence: Neurological studies show the average adult human brain weighs approximately 1.3–1.4 kilograms.

claim: Lightning never strikes water.

evidence: botanically speaking.
label: Botanical classification confirms bananas are considered berries.

claim: Dogs descended from wolves.
evidence: Genetic studies confirm domestic dogs evolved from gray wolves.

claim: Water makes up about 70% of the human body.
evidence: Human bodies are approximately 60% water by average

claim: Mount Everest grows taller every year due to tectonic activity.
evidence: Tectonic plate movements cause Mount Everest to increase slightly in height annually.

claim: The sun is a yellow star.

claim: Earth is closer to the Sun than Mars.

label: not sound.

evidence: Bats have functional eyes and are not blind

evidence: Venus has a retrograde rotation

evidence: The Pacific Ocean is the largest but does not contain more water than all other oceans combined.

evidence: Genetic research confirms humans and chimpanzees share approximately 98–99% of DNA.

evidence: Osmium and iridium are denser than gold

claim: Alaska is the largest US state by area.
evidence: Geographical measurements show Alaska is the largest state in the United States.

claim: Cats are colorblind.

claim: Coca-Cola was invented in the 19th century.
evidence: Historical records show Coca-Cola was invented in 1886.

claim: The deepest part of the ocean is the Mariana Trench.
evidence: Oceanographic surveys confirm the Mariana Trench is the deepest point.

evidence: The human body has approximately 30–40 trillion cells

claim: The largest living mammal is the blue whale.
evidence: Marine biology confirms the blue whale is the largest mammal.

evidence: The Sahara is in Africa

evidence: The Pacific Ocean is deeper than the Atlantic.
